definitions.definition: performed or occurring as a result of a sudden inner impulse or inclination and without premeditation or external stimulus.
examples: the audience broke into spontaneous applause
synonyms: unsolicited; informaloff-the-cuff "a spontaneous display of affection"

definitions.definition: (of a person) having an open, natural, and uninhibited manner.
examples: natural, uninhibited, relaxed, unselfconscious, unaffected, open, genuine, easy, free and easy; Moreimpulsive, impetuous "a spontaneous kind of person"Moreimpulsive, impetuous a spontaneous kind of person

definitions.definition: (of a process or event) occurring without apparent external cause.
(of a plant) growing naturally and without being tended or cultivated.
(of movement or activity in an organism) instinctive or involuntary.
examples: the spontaneous mechanical activity of circular smooth muscle
synonyms: visceral; informalgut "a spontaneous reaction to danger"
